name: structure_monster_info_response
description: Structure the monster's info and output it as a JSON.

monster_unique_id.description: Unique ID for the monster in our database, e.g., 'dndgpt_mon_0001'. This is a unique field.

monster_parent.description: The general category or type of monster, e.g., 'Dragon'. This is a unique field in our database.

monster_origin.description: The origin of the information. Defaults to 'srd 5.1'

monster_type.description: The type of monster, distinct from monster_parent but similar, e.g., 'Beast', 'Undead'.

monster_alignment.description: The alignment of the monster, e.g., 'Chaotic Evil'.

monster_ac.description: The armor class of the monster, e.g., '15 (natural armor)'.

monster_hp.description: The hit points of the monster including hit dice, e.g., '136 (16d8 + 64)'.

monster_speed.description: The speed of the monster, including different movement types, e.g., '30 ft., fly 60 ft.'.

monster_str.description: Strength (STR) ability score with bonus, e.g., '18 (+4)'.

monster_dex.description: Dexterity (DEX) ability score with bonus, e.g., '14 (+2)'.

monster_con.description: Constitution (CON) ability score with bonus, e.g., '16 (+3)'.

monster_int.description: Intelligence (INT) ability score with bonus, e.g., '10 (+0)'.

monster_wis.description: Wisdom (WIS) ability score with bonus, e.g., '12 (+1)'.

monster_cha.description: Charisma (CHA) ability score with bonus, e.g., '11 (+0)'.

monster_saving_throws.description: Any saving throw proficiencies, e.g., 'Dex +5, Wis +4'.

monster_senses.description: Senses available to the monster, e.g., 'darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15'.

monster_languages.description: Languages the monster can speak or understand, e.g., 'Common, Draconic'.

monster_challenge_rating.description: The challenge rating of the monster, e.g., '5 (1,800 XP)'.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_1.description: First paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_2.description: Second paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_3.description: Third paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_4.description: Fourth paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_5.description: Fifth paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_6.description: Sixth paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_unique_ability_paragraph_7.description: Seventh paragraph of a unique ability. Unique field.

monster_legendary_action_paragraph_1.description: First legendary action description. Unique field.

monster_legendary_action_paragraph_2.description: Second legendary action description. Unique field.

monster_legendary_action_paragraph_3.description: Third legendary action description. Unique field.

monster_legendary_action_paragraph_4.description: Fourth legendary action description. Unique field.

monster_legendary_action_paragraph_5.description: Fifth legendary action description. Unique field.
